name: One, a game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019
name_original: One, a game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019
description:
Using only your space bar, go through endless unforgiving levels with one boss, one screen, one key, and one bullet, if you miss your shot, it's game over.

This game was made in 1/12 of the time that the game jam allotted.
